comment_body: I'm sorry this happened to you, and I'm glad he's rotting in prison like the garbage he is. It is terrifying to read and I can't imagine how it must've felt, you're very brave for writing it out and I hope it helps you in your healing.

Ah, that's the thing. His father was chief of police so they overlooked every crime he committed. I can only hope hes in prison now. It was quite terrifying, but helped to write it out ^-^ thanks so much for the nice comment
ooooh, that sucks, but I'm glad that writing it helped.
